website_summaries.verdict: Get the whole family in one convenient set of action figures for playing, or as a collectible.
pros: The set includes all 5 members of the Incredibles family, which is a perfect gift for a child or the beginning of a collection
Each action figure is made out of durable plastic so they can hold up to real play
The characters are posed in their fighting stances, making them fun to use
The included stands make it easy to get them to stay upright
cons: Without any moving parts, the action figures are limited in their capabilities

customer_reviews.title: Not for frequent play.
customer_reviews.text: If these are for a collection and very light play they would be excellent. They look like the cartoon figures. But if you are getting them for a toddler or to be played with a lot, go for a sturdier toy. Within two days the head popped off.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy for Christmas - Good Price
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old nephew is obsessed with the incredibles, particularly Jack Jack. He carried this little toy around and kept calling it his baby. I was a bit nervous due to the small size that he would swallow it or put in his mouth, but he is almost 3 and doesnt do that. Make sure if you are getting this for young child that you watch them if this is a concern. Otherwise, great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great toys and perfect addition to a cake
customer_reviews.text: These made a great addition to a Disney themed cake. Each figurine sits on a little platform. They are made a rubber material that is flexible. They are small, but the perfect figure set for kids to play with. While we used them as decorations on the cake, they were also part of the gift to our 2 year old nephew.
customer_reviews.author: KJESPOKO

customer_reviews.title: Extremely fragile
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the Incredibles!!! The sizing is cute but if you have a kid that like chewing or licking, do not buy them! Jack Jack is extremely small. The reason why I don’t give this a 5 star review it’s because they’re very fragile! Our Violet & Elastic Girl’s head & hands came off within 2 days and the reason why I didn’t return them was simply because of lack of time.
customer_reviews.author: LTapia

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality. The mom’s head fell off after 2 days of play. These are clearly meant to sit on a shelf instead of being played with. These really aren’t meant for kids. When the mom’s head falls off, it becomes a choking hazard because it’s perfectly round. It’s really a bummer because my kids love the Incredibles.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M

customer_reviews.title: Great action figures
customer_reviews.text: Put them on top of my son's 3 year old birthday cake- looked awesome! And he was so badly about them! Now they are in his airplane bag and he loves pulling them out and playing with them. They don't move, but my son doesn't care. All he cares about is that they stand up when he puts then down. They have a nice wide base and dont tip over.
customer_reviews.author: Sara H.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy with this purchase. Th figurines looked really great on my grandson's cake. Thy were perfect. The quality was amazing and they did not have that cheap look to them. They are giftable on their own. Good price. Great vendor!
customer_reviews.author: Guadalupe Morales

customer_reviews.title: Authentic characters; great poses.
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved these hand sized action figures. Great poses, coloring accurate and exact. Also bought matching drawstring Incredibles bag for safekeeping and to hold other Incredibles paraphernalia. Delivered on time, intact, as promised, in original sturdy packaging.
customer_reviews.author: PA Resident

customer_reviews.title: Good for cake toppers
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend these as toys... our son is 3 and has pulled all the heads off but one and they are not pf good quality. We purchased them for a cake so for that I say they are good.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Macumber

customer_reviews.title: *****CHOKING HAZARD****
customer_reviews.text: Used them as cake toppers which was really cute. After a couple days of my 3 year old playing with them 2 lost their heads. ***** Choking hazard******
customer_reviews.author: deyon

customer_reviews.title: I’m not convinced these were new
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for one of the little girls I babysit for. She automatically loved them because she adores the incredibles, however as you can see most of them seem to be already used when they were supposedly brand new. Their paint seems to be chipped off and worn down in a lot of areas. I feel like I got some bootleg dupe lmao. I’m a little upset about it but she doesn’t seem to really care so it is what it is lol
customer_reviews.author: carly

customer_reviews.title: Great size for small hands
customer_reviews.text: Great size and wonderful set for incredible fans! My little granddaughters favorite toy! I have seen a lot of these small sets and many are extremely tiny. This is perfect size for small hands. Reasonable price. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah R

customer_reviews.title: Make sure the recipient doesn’t already have it.
customer_reviews.text: He loved it! Too bad he already had a set but he’s gonna keep this set and return the other he was gifted from a brick and mortar store so it worked out.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Engelhardt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Used as a cake topper for a party.. they needed up being cleaned off and played with. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Scott Rowan

customer_reviews.title: Look as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Nice figures, look like pictures and when my dog ate the first package Amazon replaces for free and they arrived just in time for my cake order. Perfect size for my cake topper.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Eastin

customer_reviews.title: This are amazing
customer_reviews.text: We used them as cake toppers then gave them away when we cut the cake. the kids loved it and is a much cheaper alternative than making a cake with a picture. so we just had a plain red and black cake made and popped these right on top.
customer_reviews.author: A laz

customer_reviews.title: Decent Set
customer_reviews.text: They are a decent set. The plastic is cheaper and thinner than I expected though.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 4y.o. nephew for Christmas. He loves them. He also has two siblings and things that make it thru those three are very well made. These held up well!
customer_reviews.author: lori Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: Cute toys .. smaller than expected.. but overall still nice and good quality
customer_reviews.author: samuel Rosa alcantara

customer_reviews.title: Great for cake topper and toys
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a cake topper for my sons’ birthday party and they are wonderful. After the party I cleaned them and they have been joyfully playing with them ever since. They have even been taking them in the bath and they are still perfect except for a little paint is rubbing off of the jack jack figurine. Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Esser

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing. Poorly made. We've had to glue heads and arms back on several times on each of the girls. The paint is scratched off and came scratched off and poorly painted. Don't buy this item.
customer_reviews.author: Jwa

customer_reviews.title: Bought to use on a bad
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to put on my sons birthday cake. They come packaged very well and look like a great toy
customer_reviews.author: AshleyP

customer_reviews.title: Fun cake decorations
customer_reviews.text: Heavier then we thought it should be, but very fun to add to the cake for decorations
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, the little figurines are great. I had to buy 2, 1 for each of my daughters and they have been playing with them nonstop.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Well made set!
customer_reviews.text: Well made toys, packaged well. Color is exact, they stand good. Great to use for cake toppers or just play. My daughter loves them and I’m a happy mama!
customer_reviews.author: derek c. stokan

customer_reviews.title: Incredible!
customer_reviews.text: Great for party decorating! Our son had fun decorating his birthday cake and table with these.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Character Reproductions
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I left them in their shrinkwrap in the original box to display on our toys shelf. They are very well made and are exact reproductions from the characters in the movie(s).
customer_reviews.author: Superdog

customer_reviews.title: Not a lasting toy. I'm disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: First thing g I have not pleased with. Very flimpsy. Violet and elastic girl broke in the first week
customer_reviews.author: Rosy

customer_reviews.title: Great for cake toppers!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for cake toppers. Great for this purpose. Not recommended as play toys. Very cheap, flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Reading_Momma

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: I love them! I would be 100% satisfied if Elastigirl's face was more accurate. The rest of the family looks good. Anyway 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Heriberto

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but other options are better. Lots of packaging to make them seem great.
customer_reviews.text: There are others that are less expensive for more variety (on Amazon). I'm returning these.
customer_reviews.author: Primelove

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Nice add to the Cake decorating my little one was happy
customer_reviews.author: sandi rafael nunez

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, broke before my kid even was able to play with it.
customer_reviews.text: Super cheap quality, Mr. incredibles foot broke as we were opening the box.
customer_reviews.author: May May

customer_reviews.title: They are PERFRCT
customer_reviews.text: These were truly perfect. The size was great for my 6” round 4 layer cake
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Adams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for a cake topper for my 5 year old's birthday!
customer_reviews.author: Luca B.

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for our sons cake and now he keeps playing with them as they are really well made!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set of all the characters
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. I have a Disney Christmas tree and it’s hard to find ornaments for every movie that aren’t over priced so i turned them into ornaments by screwing an eyehole screw in them and it worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The figures are perfect! I bought this to put on top of a birthday cake. They come on individuales stands which is perfect because they stand on their own. Good quality!
customer_reviews.author: dynamitedali

customer_reviews.title: Small but ok
customer_reviews.text: Small pieces but Good quality. It would be perfect to have a bigger height. The rest was cool
customer_reviews.author: Berthalina M.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material and broke within minutes
customer_reviews.text: These characters are made of hard plastic. They broke within 15 minutes of giving them as a gift. I was so disappointed !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maryb

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: As pictured worked perfect for the cake my daughter made for her cousin and then made a cool keepsake
customer_reviews.author: dizzled

customer_reviews.title: Very nice figurines
customer_reviews.text: I used these as cupcake toppers. They were great as they were better keepable gifts than plastic rings that are usually used as toppers.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and design. Used for cake decoration and all the kids loved! After the party, my kids still playing with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love the toys and worked great as cake toppers!
customer_reviews.author: claudia

customer_reviews.title: Great for cake toppers
customer_reviews.text: I used them as cake toppers which worked out great
customer_reviews.author: Justine K Strinz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome choice
customer_reviews.text: The pieces are perfect for any cake, my kid loves them ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredibles cake topper
customer_reviews.text: excellent shape and we use it to decorate my son's birthday cake
customer_reviews.author: alejandro l.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality, elasti girls head fell off, dashs body broke. Wouldnt buy again
customer_reviews.author: Priscila

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love them, perfect size and they are really nice
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, poor paint job, very poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: From when we opened the box we could tell there was something “off” about these toys. Mainly, Elastigirl/Mrs. Incredible. Inside the unopened packaging, she had noticeable black marks on her face and super suit. And to top it all off, her arm just randomly popped off! Extremely poor quality. Either these are knock-offs or the manufacturers need to be fired!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Sedano

product_meta.title: The Incredibles 2, 5 Piece Family Figure Set comes with (Mr./Mrs. Incredible, Violet, Dash, Jack Jack)
product_meta.description: The whole gang is here in this mini figure set and when the entire Incredibles family gets together, there is no problemor supervillain they can't handle. Includes Mr. Incredible and Elastigirl, Violet, Dash and Jack-Jack. Perfect for play or display. 3.5 inch figures of the entire Incredibles family. Accurate scale and exciting poses. Perfect for play or display. Recommended for Ages: 3+
feature_bullets: Set includes the incredible family Mr Incredible and elastigirl, violet, dash and jack

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars309 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
